values:
My Journal is now friends only so if you wanna view it your gonna have to get me to add you as a friend on LJ.
Sorry...

1. What time is it? 1:45
 
2. Name: Dan
 
3. Name as it appears on birth certificate: Daniel Graham Smith

4. Nickname: Spliff

5. Number of candles on last birthday cake: I cant remember

6. Pets: lots of little fishes
 
7. Natural Hair Color: light brown

8. What friend will have the most entertaining answers: I dunno
 
9. Eye Colour: Green
 
10. How much do you love your job on a scale of 1 to 10: Job? I think not
 
11. Birthplace: Freedom Fields hospital

12. Current residence: St John

13. Favorite food: Sara Lee Double Chocolate Geataux
 
14. Been to Africa? nope
 
15. Been toilet papered? Toilet papered? I....Dont think so

16. Love someone so much it made you cry? Probably

17. Been in a car crash? i've been in a car park
 
18. Croutons or bacon bits? Bacon bits for sure

19. Favorite day of the week? this sunday

20. Favorite word or phase: No not that hole!

21. Favorite Restaurant: mmmmmm oggy oggy....no Jakes......no Subway.......no BK......arghh its no use I cant decide

22. Favorite Flower: white rose

23. Favorite sport to play: pure lazyness

24. Favorite Drink: apple tango
 
25. Favorite Ice Cream: I dont like ice cream - weird eh?
 
26. Favorite fast food restaurant: didnt I do this one earlyer?

27. What color is your bedroom carpet: no carpet - wooden floor

28. Besides this one, who sent you your last e-mail: Face-pic.com - you have a new message in your inbox
 
29. Which store would you choose to max out your credit card? Probably game - i'm a big geek at heart
 
30. What do you do most often when you are bored? MSN, TV, Video games, make a website or make a animation.
 
31. Most annoying thing people ask/tell me: Get a hair cut ya fucking gothic leek.
 
32. Bedtime: i'm such a rebel, I decide

33. Who will respond to this email the quickest? who knows?

34. Who is the person you sent this to that is least likely to respond? i haven't sent it yet

35. Favorite TV show: dont really have on, DBZ if its on
 
36. Last person you went out to Lunch with: Roose, Jak & James @ Irenes Pantry

39. Time you finished this email: 1:59

I'm not very good at writing my feelings but I'll just put events here, so far this weekend has been wierd.
+ I went to the cinema with Roose & Gordan, we cruised there in Gordans car, its really wierd having a mate driving, made me feel all growned up =D
- I ran for the first time in 3 years & I fell over my baggy assed trousers and slid accross the concrete, now I'm bruised & sore & have gashed my knee & elbow =(
+ I played xbox live @ gordans. I want broadband so I can play Tenchu online with him.

Watched The Last Of The Samarai last night, its bloody good, one of the best films Tom Cruise has ever done - its close between that and Vanilla Sky which I also loved.

Discovered a new band who I like called Sigor Ross, thank you Jak.

anyways I'll write more on this thing another time, should be intresting to look back on in a few years time.
